00028 /*
00029  * This file is part of Lustre, http://www.lustre.org/
00030  *
00031  * Author: Nathan Rutman <nathan.rutman@sun.com>
00032  *
00033  * Kernel <-> userspace communication routines.
00034  * The definitions below are used in the kernel and userspace.
00035  */
00036 
00037 #ifndef __LUSTRE_KERNELCOMM_H__
00038 #define __LUSTRE_KERNELCOMM_H__
00039 
00040 /* For declarations shared with userspace */
00041 #include <uapi_kernelcomm.h>
00042 
00043 /* prototype for callback function on kuc groups */
00044 typedef int (*libcfs_kkuc_cb_t)(void *data, void *cb_arg);
00045 
00046 /* Kernel methods */
00047 int libcfs_kkuc_msg_put(struct file *fp, void *payload);
00048 int libcfs_kkuc_group_put(int group, void *payload);
00049 int libcfs_kkuc_group_add(struct file *fp, int uid, int group,
00050                           void *data, size_t data_len);
00051 int libcfs_kkuc_group_rem(int uid, int group);
00052 int libcfs_kkuc_group_foreach(int group, libcfs_kkuc_cb_t cb_func,
00053                               void *cb_arg);
00054 
00055 #endif /* __LUSTRE_KERNELCOMM_H__ */
00056
